subject: Mixed Martial Arts
Athletics and Sports
Sports Medicine
Plastic Surgery
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Mixed martial arts fighters, who often are at risk of deep lacerations, are turning to plastic surgery with hopes of limiting their propensity for bleeding and prolonging their careers.
snippet: Mixed martial arts fighters, who often are at risk of deep lacerations, are turning to plastic surgery with hopes of limiting their propensity for bleeding and prolonging their careers.
